comments: Focusing on Speed and HP% will make Lynx heal often and give her some bulk. Since Lynx's HP Buff on her Skill / ATK Increase from Eidolon 4 is based on her HP, HP chest can be considered over Outgoing Healing Bonus for more Team DPS, as the difference in healing output is not significant.
traces_priority: Advance Surveying (A2) > Survival in the Extreme (A6) > Exploration Techniques (A4)
name: Pure Healer
